issue.title: [C++] Stop using memcmp in TensorEquals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5830](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5830). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because memcmp problematic for comparing floating-point values, such as NaNs.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5830?focusedCommentId=16916648) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5166
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5166>
